In England, in the seven days to 25 February, there were 54,676 new confirmed cases (97.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 February, there were 69,257 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 21% (14,581 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 March is 3,668,620 (6,517.7 cases per 100,000 population).
